How to make tabs



How to make columns 

Below is the psuedo code to make two columns


```{r, results='asis'}

paste("""
  :::::::::::::: {.columns}
  ::: {.column width=\"50%\"}
  
  First column commentary, code chunks, images, graphs, and charts
  
  :::
  ::: {.column width=\"50%\"}
  
  2nd column stuff
  
  :::
  ::::::::::::::
  
  :::::::::::::: {.columns}
  ::: {.column width=\"50%\"}
""")

```
